name: participant
description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in a PCGL program.

fields.name: submitter_participant_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the participant, assigned by the data provider.

meta.mappings: CQDG: submitter_participant_id;mCODE STU3: Patient.Identifer;Phenopacket: Individual.id; Beacon V2: Individual.id

fields.name: sex_at_birth
fields.description: Refers to sex assigned at birth. Sex at birth is typically assigned based on a person's reproductive system and other physical characteristics. The provided values are based on the categoried defined by Statistics Canada

meta.mappings: All4One: Biological Sex;CQDG: Sex;mCODE3: Patient.extension.birthsex;Phenopacket: Individual.sex;Beacon V2: Individual.sex

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Refers to an individual's personal and social identity as a man, woman or non-binary person (a person who is not exclusively a man or a woman). The provided values are based on the categories defined by Statistics Canada

fields.name: ethnicity
fields.description: Refers to the ethnic or cultural origins of a person’s ancestors. The provided values are based on the list of ethnic or cultural origins 2021 defined by Statistics Canada

fields.name: race
fields.description: A social construct used to judge and categorize people based on perceived differences in physical appearance in ways that create and maintain power differentials within social hierarchies. There is no scientifically supported biological basis for discrete racial groups. The provided values are based on race-based data standard defined by CIHI guidance

fields.name: vital_status
fields.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased.

meta.mappings: All4One: Month,year of birth;mCODE STU3: Patient.birthDate;Phenopacket: Individual.date_of_birth;Beacon V2: Individual.date_of_birth

meta.notes: Validation_rule: Value present only when participant.vital_status==deceased'
